container-fluid.why_there_is_page_content: Emm, good question. I used to own a personal blog. It's abandoned afterwards as blog requires content to be filled in, while a HTML5 page and links to social media are able to achieve the same purpose. However, he is a guy in general who remembers and works on something called...
